message: Adding the Repo via the "Organizer" window where I can enter my github.com credentials still gives me an auth error.
Selecting "Connect to a repo" from the startup screen and using a github URL yields an authentication error.
The remote handling in 4 is really bad IMO, I'd suggest using the command line to push/pull
@kneath Seems like buggy is the trend for 4. Hope they get that figured out.
But it will probably be a ways off before it's good to go
As do I. FWIW, we're doing our best to get in touch with the Xcode team again to try and help 'em out
